channel.title: Objects duplicating?
channel.description: I am running fr33sc4p3 pkz and to add objects i use the addaobject(x coord, y coord, object id, 10 (so it knows it ain't a door or wall), rotation(which way it faces)) and when i do that the objects get duplicated in random places, like my entire training room in varrock is sited in far wildy, south of seers, at ::con, recruitment drive quest room, and more. I am wondering if there is a different method besides addaobject like i've heard of makeglobalobject or something but i do addaobject cause it was already in the fr33sc4p3 source.

item.title: Objects duplicating?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

I am running fr33sc4p3 pkz and to add objects i use the addaobject(x coord, y coord, object id, 10 (so it knows it ain’t a door or wall), rotation(which way it faces)) and when i do that the objects get duplicated in random places, like my entire training room in varrock is sited in far wildy, south of seers, at ::con, recruitment drive quest room, and more. I am wondering if there is a different method besides addaobject like i’ve heard of makeglobalobject or something but i do addaobject cause it was already in the fr33sc4p3 source.
